description: Timer Trigger Tool that triggers a workflow after a specified delay or at a specific time.

triggerType.description: Type of trigger, either 'delay' or 'scheduled'. This parameter is required.

delaySeconds.description: Delay in seconds for the delay trigger. Optional, but at least one delay parameter is required if triggerType is 'delay'.

delayMinutes.description: Delay in minutes for the delay trigger. Optional, but at least one delay parameter is required if triggerType is 'delay'.

delayHours.description: Delay in hours for the delay trigger. Optional, but at least one delay parameter is required if triggerType is 'delay'.

scheduledTime.description: Scheduled time for the scheduled trigger, must be in ISO string format or timestamp. Required if triggerType is 'scheduled'.

allowPastTriggers.description: Indicates if past triggers are allowed. Optional, defaults to 'false'.

simulateOnly.description: If set to 'true', simulates the trigger without waiting. Optional, defaults to 'false'.

accelerateTime.description: If set to 'true', accelerates the time for testing purposes. Optional, defaults to 'false'.
